docs.text: Welcome to mklorum For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. example code block #!/usr/bin/env bash for $file in ls; do echo $file; done
docs.title: Welcome to mklorum

docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: Homelab Overview Technologies Hypervisor / virtualisation: Kernel Kirtual Machines (KVM) Storage / NAS: FreeNAS Backups Time machine backups for macbooks SMB share for Windows clients NFS share for Linux clients Currently, no VM filesystems are backed up; ZFS takes care of that at the host level. Services Plex Media Server Confluence I no longer self-host an Atlassian Confluence instance. It was used solely for documentation which has now been replaced with mkdocs and github-pages.
docs.title: Homelab Overview
